fields.name: Mixed Funky Mallows
fields.description: Indulge in the sweet, soft delight of our Mixed Funky Mallows! Bursting with vibrant colors and fun shapes, these fluffy treats are perfect for snacking, sharing, or adding a playful touch to your desserts. A melt-in-your-mouth mallow experience that's as cheerful as it is delicious.

fields.name: Fruity Mallows
fields.description: Savor the sweet, fruity charm of our Strawberry & Peach Mallows! Soft, colorful, and bursting with juicy strawberry and peach flavors, these pink and orange treats are as delightful to look at as they are to eat. Perfect for snacking, sharing, or adding a fruity twist to your desserts!

fields.name: Snowy Mallows
fields.description: Delight in the classic sweetness of our Snowy Marshmalleos! Soft, fluffy, and pure white, these melt-in-your-mouth marshmallows are perfect for snacking, toasting, or adding a touch of cozy charm to your favorite hot drinks and desserts. A timeless treat for every occasion!

fields.name: Fizzy Worms
fields.description: Get ready for a zesty burst of flavor with our Multicolored Fizzy Worms! These chewy, sugar-coated treats are packed with tangy goodness in a rainbow of vibrant colors. Perfect for a sour kick on their own or adding a fun twist to your sweet creations. A playful treat for all ages!

fields.name: Sherbert-Fizz Hearts
fields.description: Feel the sparkle with our Sherbet Fizz Hearts! These sweet, heart-shaped treats are bursting with a fizzy sherbet tang that tingles your taste buds. Perfectly playful and delightfully zesty, they're ideal for snacking, sharing, or adding a pop of fun to any occasion!

fields.name: Blueberry-fizz Bottles
fields.description: Enjoy a burst of berry magic with our Blueberry-Fizz Bottles! These bottle-shaped sweets are packed with tangy blueberry flavor and a fizzy coating that’s sure to tingle your taste buds. Perfect for snacking, sharing, or adding a fun, zesty twist to your sweet collection!

fields.name: Chocolate Truffles
fields.description: Indulge in the rich, creamy delight of our Chocolate Truffles! Each bite is a luxurious melt-in-your-mouth experience, with smooth, velvety chocolate that’s perfect for satisfying your sweet cravings. Ideal for gifting, sharing, or treating yourself to a little decadence.

fields.name: Raspberry-Cocoa Truffles
fields.description: Treat yourself to the irresistible combination of rich chocolate and tangy raspberry with our Raspberry-Cocoa Truffles! Each bite offers a velvety smooth chocolate shell filled with a luscious raspberry-infused cocoa center. Perfect for indulging, gifting, or adding a touch of elegance to any occasion.

fields.name: Mized Chocolate Jazzies
fields.description: Crunch into the delightful sweetness of our Mixed Chocolate Jazzies! These bite-sized treats are covered in smooth milk or dark chocolate, topped with a colorful sprinkle of crunchy candy pieces. Perfect for snacking, sharing, or adding a fun, jazzy twist to any sweet occasion!

fields.name: Mini Bears
fields.description: Enjoy the chewy, fruity goodness of our Mini Bears! These soft, bite-sized gummy bears come in a variety of delicious flavors, making them perfect for snacking, sharing, or adding a playful touch to any sweet treat. Fun, colorful, and always a crowd-pleaser!

fields.name: Gummy Worms
fields.description: Twist into fun with our Gummy Worms! These chewy, colorful treats come in a variety of fruity flavors, making them perfect for snacking, sharing, or adding a playful touch to your favorite sweets. Bursting with tangy goodness in every wriggly bite!

fields.name: Apricot Chewies
fields.description: Savor the sweet, tangy flavor of our Apricot Chewies with a delightful sugar dusting! These soft, chewy treats are packed with the natural sweetness of apricots, offering a perfect balance of fruity goodness and a sugary finish. Ideal for snacking, sharing, or enjoying a fruity twist on your favorite treats!

fields.name: Watermelon Hearts
fields.description: Enjoy the refreshing taste of our Watermelon Hearts! These hard sweets are bursting with juicy watermelon flavor and shaped like little hearts for a sweet, nostalgic treat. Perfect for long-lasting enjoyment or adding a fruity touch to any occasion!

fields.name: Assorted Travel Sweets
fields.description: Embark on a flavor journey with our Travel Sweets! These hard candies come in four classic flavors—zesty lime, tangy orange, sweet strawberry, and crisp apple—making them the perfect companion for any trip or a refreshing treat on the go. Enjoy a burst of fruity goodness in every piece!

fields.name: Candy Corn
fields.description: Delight in the timeless taste of our Hard Candy Corn Sweets! With their classic sweet, buttery flavor and vibrant colors, these nostalgic treats are perfect for savoring slowly or sharing with friends. A deliciously sweet addition to any occasion or sweet collection!

fields.name: Mini Mochis
fields.description: Treat yourself to our Assorted Mochi-Style Sweets, available in low sugar, lactose-free, and plant-based options! These soft, chewy delights come in a variety of mouthwatering flavors, offering a guilt-free indulgence for every dietary need. Perfect for snacking, sharing, or enjoying a delicious, allergy-friendly treat!

fields.name: Assorted Fruit Pastilles
fields.description: Enjoy the fruity goodness of our Assorted Fruit Pastilles, available in low sugar, lactose-free, and plant-based options! Bursting with natural fruit flavors, these chewy treats are the perfect guilt-free indulgence for any dietary need. Ideal for snacking, sharing, or enjoying a refreshing burst of sweetness anytime!

fields.name: Assorted Jelly Bears
fields.description: Delight in our Assorted Jelly Bears, available in low sugar, lactose-free, and plant-based options! These soft, fruity gummies come in a variety of delicious flavors, offering a sweet treat that’s perfect for any dietary need. Ideal for snacking, sharing, or enjoying a playful burst of flavor!
